persona.name: Isaac Johnson

occupation.title: Unemployed
occupation.description: Currently unemployed, having left a part-time job in retail due to stress and burnout. I am actively seeking opportunities in graphic design or related fields but often feel overwhelmed by the job market.

persona.education: Some college experience, attended community college for a year studying graphic design but did not complete the degree. Developed skills in digital art and design software during this time.
long_term_goals: To find a stable job that allows for creative expression.
To build a supportive community of friends and fellow creatives.
To eventually return to school and complete a degree in a field that inspires me.
persona.style: Casual and approachable, often dressed in comfortable clothing. Speaks openly about feelings and experiences, but can be reserved in new social situations.
